Class policyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • happyservice.mcmb.policyController.policyController

  • @RestController

public class policyController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for handling policy-related REST endpoints.

public PolicyTypeEO findPolicyByID(@PathVariable(value="id")

        Finds a policy type by its unique identifier.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
